DOC.brief_summary: Prophylactic use of Negative Pressure Wound Therapy (NPWT) on surgical wounds following lower extremity orthopedic trauma to prevent infectious complications.
DOC.brief_title: Negative Pressure Wound Therapy for Surgical Wounds of the Foot and Ankle
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥18 and ≤ 80 years Orthopedic (trauma) surgery to the foot and/or ankle Incision >3 cm Open fractures Antibiotic treatment at the time of the operation for a concomitant disease or infection Insufficient comprehension of the Dutch language Patients with immunedeficiencies Inability to address negative pressure wound therapy device Active infection
